resources.string: Welcome to E-library! This service is provided by your local library. Swipe left for next page.
You can browse e-books and audiobooks by genre, book or author, or browse recommendation lists made by librarians. Swipe left for next page.
Browse the selection, borrow and read or listen! If a book is on loan, press "reserve" to get it when it becomes available. Swipe left for next page.
Or do you want something to listen to? The collection also includes an untold number of audiobooks! Click "borrow" to listen to the audiobook. Swipe left to close tutorial.
Error logging in. Please restart app and try again.
